tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE novel_drug_targets (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50),
  expression_profile TEXT,
  drug_target_label VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE drug_gene_relationship (
    relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_id INT,
    gene_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES drug_targets(target_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES gene_expression_profiles(gene_id)
);

CREATE TABLE GeneExpression (
  expression_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_id UUID,
  patient_id UUID,
  expression_level FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Genes(gene_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DrugTargets (
  target_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_id UUID,
  target_name VARCHAR,
  action VARCHAR,
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Genes(gene_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ClinicalTrials ( 
  trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  trial_name STRING, 
  target_id INT REFERENCES DrugTargets(target_id), 
  start_date DATE, 
  end_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchResults ( 
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  trial_id INT REFERENCES ClinicalTrials(trial_id), 
  gene_id INT REFERENCES GeneExpression(gene_id), 
  result_type STRING, 
  result_description STRING 
);
